title: Mario Mutsch
snippet: Transitioning to coaching, Mutsch ... under Luc Holtz (2019–2025, involved in 61 matches). He progressed through youth ranks, leading the U15s (2019–2021), U17s (2021–2022), and U19s (2022–2025), before assuming the head coach role for the Luxembourg U21 team on 1 July ...
